title: 4K - The Bee Girl (1959) A beautiful woman by day - a lusting queen wasp by night

sources.title: 4K - The Bee Girl (1959) A beautiful woman by day - a lusting queen wasp by night
sources.description:
Experience Roger Corman's cult masterpiece THE WASP WOMAN (1959) - the film that put the "ouch" in cosmetics! When a brilliant scientist and a beauty mogul cook up a youth serum from wasp venom, their anti-aging breakthrough takes a SHOCKING turn. Who knew looking young could be this... terrifying?

Original title: The Wasp Woman.  Alternative titles: Insect Woman / The Bee Girl

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/8TE0d11tgyA

‚≠êÔ∏è STARRING
Susan Cabot - Janice Starlin (the buzz-worthy CEO)
Michael Mark - Dr. Zinthrop (the not-so-sweet scientist)
Anthony Eisley - Bill Lane (the hive investigator)
Barboura Morris - Mary Dennison (the loyal assistant)

üé¨ CREW CREDITS
Directed by:  Roger Corman https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdYLD4ZQC1D1o3WC_ePvnOng
Screenplay by: Leo Gordon & Kinta Zertuche
Cinematography: Harry Neumann
Monster Effects: The legendary Paul Blaisdell

B-MOVIE TRIVIA
‚Ä¢ Shot in just 5 DAYS on a honey-budget!
‚Ä¢ Susan Cabot did her own stunts in the iconic wasp costume

WARNING: Contains 100% more buzzing than your average board meeting!
